# DWG-PURGE

DWG-PURGE, will purge the current drawing of its unused AutoCAD items as well as DGN-related linetypes To purge the Current drawing enter DWG-PURGE at the command line Once the purge is done AutoCAD Text Window will pop up with the result as show below.

# DWG-PURGE-BATCH
